title: On the Edge of Innocence
descriptions:
On the Edge of Innocence is a 1997 television drama film. The story revolves around 18-year-old Zoe Tyler, who is a rebellious teenager dealing with various personal issues, including an unstable home life. After being arrested for shoplifting, Zoe is sent to a psychiatric institution for evaluation.

During her stay at the institution, Zoe befriends a fellow inmate named Jake, who is struggling with his own set of emotional problems. As their relationship deepens, Zoe and Jake start to form a strong bond, which becomes an essential part of their therapy and recovery process.

However, their budding friendship is put to the test when Jake's past experiences and the harsh realities of the institution begin to affect their relationship. Despite the challenges, Zoe and Jake continue to support each other as they work through their individual issues and navigate the complexities of growing up.

As Zoe confronts her own demons and learns to take responsibility for her actions, she begins to understand the true meaning of friendship, love, and redemption. The film ultimately explores the themes of self-discovery, hope, and the healing power of human connection in the face of adversity.
